Job Posting:175054 - Position: W26 Mobile Application Developer Co-op 175054 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/18/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/04/2025 02:56 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country FGF Brands 1295 Ormont Drive Toronto M9L 2W6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Mobile Application Developer Co-op 175054 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Mobile Application Developer Co-op (Winter 2026) Job ID: 2025-21338 Get ready for a Naan-Traditional placement experience! We're not your average bakery. We're a team of passionate thinkers and doers that are challenging the idea of what a bakery can be. We operate like a startup, powered by creativity and a 'roll up your sleeves' mentality, to give our customers the best possible product Job Summary As a Mobile Application Developer co-op, you will work closely with our experienced development team to create, test, and maintain mobile applications across multiple platforms. Under the guidance of senior developers, you will have the opportunity to collaborate on various projects, implementing features, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring high-quality deliverables. Key Responsibilities • Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, test, and deploy mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms • Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment and maintenance • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following industry best practices and coding standards • Conduct thorough testing and debugging of mobile applications to identify and resolve any issues or bugs • Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure the applications meet user requirements and deliver a seamless user experience In compliance with Ontario's Bill 190, we confirm that this posting represents a current, existing vacancy within our organization. Job Requirements Key Qualifications • Solid understanding of mobile application development concepts and frameworks, including iOS and/or Android development • Experience with programming languages such as Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, Java, Kotlin, or React Native • Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail • Excellent communication and teamwork skills • Familiarity with OOPS design principles Ability to adapt to changing project requirements and work in a fast-paced environment • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careerscoopinternen-fgfbrands.icims.com/jobs/21338/mobile-application-developer-co-op-%28winter-2026%29/job Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
